name: Complete UX Research KIT
description:
This Figma file is created with the purpose of delivering high quality UX research that every product team needs. The files are created as per the guideline of Google. FREE to use for your exploration or personal project.


Files Included:

  • Recruit Interview Participants
  • Interview Transcripts
  • Empathy Map
  • User Persona
  • User Stories
  • User Journey
  • User Flow
  • Problem/Hypothesis Statement
  • Value Proposition
  • Competitive Audit
  • Crazy 8's


I will keep updating this free and open-source file in the future. Enjoy!
